name: when lives cross
description:
What does it mean to be at the right place at the right time?

Alternating between the perspectives of two strangers, when lives cross is a short interactive fiction game about a chance meeting where two lives cross. 

cw: grief/loss

created for MelonJam2 using unity and fungus for visual scripting :) overall very rough, i don't think the narrative is clear at all sorry 😭 but the mechanics are mostly drag and drop so just try dragging stuff if the level doesn't seem to progress on its own

music credits:  why - prod. venus
